column4: I am watching network traffic on wireshark, and see a lot of dns requests originating from my computer to an IP address it can't reach, for locations I've never heard of. Any ideas how to track down what is causing this?

I am watching network traffic on wireshark, and see a lot of dns requests originating from my computer to an IP address it can't reach, for locations I've never heard of. Any ideas how to track down what is causing this?
i found this link to be an interesting read: http://blog.gnist.org/article.php?story=HollidayCracking
that doesn't look quite like what I am seeing. Fun read though ^_^
